import React from 'react' import data from '../assets/products.json' import { ToggleColumns } from './ToggleColumns' export const ProductList = (props) => { // TODO: display appropriate header // TODO: display only chosen columns return (
Product List ({data.length})
{data.map((data, index) =>{ return })}
ID Name Department Price
{data.id} {data.name} {data.department} {data.price + '$'}
) }
